subject: Basketball
Advertising and Marketing
Logos
lead_paragraph: The W.N.B.A. has signed a long-term deal with Boost Mobile that will put the cellphone company’s logo on the jerseys of 10 of the league’s 12 teams.
snippet: The W.N.B.A. has signed a long-term deal with Boost Mobile that will put the cellphone company’s logo on the jerseys of 10 of the league’s 12 teams.
